title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat interface, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports chatting, pulling models and listing tags asynchronously.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI wrapper that adds progress bars, config profiles and shell completions to ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding copilot with explain/refactor commands.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration enabling Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of curl snippets and shell scripts for every Ollama REST endpoint—useful for CI and testing.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and moderation filters.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop app for macOS/Windows/Linux to chat with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app that exposes Ollama models via REST and WebSockets with built-in throttling.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing a typed JS/TS client for the Ollama API (same repo as ollama-js).

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama; install via pip and start chatting in Python in seconds.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with tokio, serde and native TLS—ideal for high-performance binaries.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 library and CLI for Ollama supporting generics, DI and System.Text.Json serialization.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated registry of Modelfile recipes for Llama-3, Phi-3, CodeLlama, Zephyr, etc.
